\newcommand{\noun}[1]{\textsc{#1}}
%% Because html converters don't know tabularnewline
\providecommand{\tabularnewline}{\\}

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% Textclass specific LaTeX commands.
\newenvironment{lyxlist}[1]
{\begin{list}{}
{\settowidth{\labelwidth}{#1}
 \setlength{\leftmargin}{\labelwidth}
 \addtolength{\leftmargin}{\labelsep}
 \renewcommand{\makelabel}[1]{##1\hfil}}}
{\end{list}}

% \documentclass[12pt,twoside,a4paper]{book}
\pagestyle{plain}

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%   all about the text
\setlength{\textwidth}{15cm}
\setlength{\textheight}{23.6cm}

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%   all about margins
\setlength{\topmargin}{2.8cm}
\setlength{\marginparsep}{0in}
\setlength{\marginparwidth}{0in}
\setlength{\marginparpush}{0in}
\setlength{\oddsidemargin}{3.5cm}
\setlength{\evensidemargin}{2.5cm}

\setlength{\hoffset}{-2.54cm}
\setlength{\voffset}{-2.54cm}

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%   all about the page header
\setlength{\headheight}{15pt}
\setlength{\headsep}{16pt}

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%   all about the footer
%\setlength{\footheight}{10pt}
\setlength{\footskip}{18pt}

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%       Set line spacing  (by Muliplier ... 1.5 here)
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
\renewcommand{\baselinestretch}{1.5}

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%       Fancy Page Layout with Fancy Header
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
\pagestyle{fancy}

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%   all about head & foot rule
\renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{1pt}
\renewcommand{\footrulewidth}{0.0pt}
\setlength{\headwidth}{\textwidth}

\renewcommand{\chaptermark}[1]{\markboth{Chapter \thechapter}{}}
\renewcommand{\sectionmark}[1]{\markright{ \thesection\ #1}}


%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%   all about shown content in
%   header
\lhead[\bfseries Page \thepage]{\bfseries\rightmark}
\rhead[\bfseries\leftmark]{\bfseries Page \thepage}
\cfoot{}
% \rfoot{\bfseries\thepage}


%Laplace-Transformation Symbol
\newcommand{\Laplacevw}{\unitlength 1em        % Laplace vorw√§rts waagrecht
    \begin{picture}(2.4,0.6)%
    \put(0.4,0.3){\circle{0.3}}%
    \put(0.55,0.3){\line(1,0){1.1}}%
    \put(1.85,0.3){\circle*{0.3}}%
    \put(0.85,0.5){$\mathcal{L}$}%
    \end{picture}%
}
